Posts.EditableText:
No one uses squiffy, and the web client for QUEST  is far from stable. It freezes and becomes unresponsive frequently. 

The program also doesn't play nice with wineskin winery, and I would like to be able to play these on my Mac reliably.

If you knows of a reliable way to run quest on Mac without boot camping, I'd be grateful.
Posts.HTML:
No one uses squiffy, and the web client for QUEST is far from stable. It freezes and becomes unresponsive frequently.

The program also doesn't play nice with wineskin winery, and I would like to be able to play these on my Mac reliably.
